H0.text: Who was Captain Pugwash’s bitter enemy. Blackbeak Betty

H1.text: Who was Captain Pugwash’s bitter enemy. Barnaby Blackheart

H2.text: Who was Captain Pugwash’s bitter enemy. Captain Cutlass

H3.text: Who was Captain Pugwash’s bitter enemy. Cut-Throat Jake

A4.text: His mortal enemy is Cut-Throat Jake, captain of the Flying Dustman.
